website_summaries.verdict: The 4-pack of organic Egyptian sponges ranks high for value.
pros: These loofah back scrubbers are 100% natural
Purchasing in a handy 4-pack, means there is always a fresh loofah available for guests
Handy for taking to the spa or for use when traveling, the convenient 4-pack loofahs each have a cord for hanging the scrubber up to dry
cons: These loofahs are rather stiff and inflexible, even when wet
Some users with sensitive skin may find this loofah too abrasive

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. These sponges are small and that would be fine if they didn’t flatten out and turn into a wet ball once the water hits them! I had gotten them for the shower but they were useless so I tried them in the sink as well- no good either. My previous luffa sponge held its shape decently. These also began shedding within 4-5 uses. Asking for a refund!!
customer_reviews.author: CeeCee

customer_reviews.title: Low price for small product
customer_reviews.text: They are small, it fits in the soap holder in my shower nicely. They are a little thin too, But for the low price it is a great option. From what I see it's about twice as much for the bigger, nicer ones. It does soften a bit in water, but it is meant to be a little rough. Quality makes sense for the price.
